short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds Curation by using mytra website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows different styles available in myntra.com to be combined together to form a single link. This link can be used to share across platforms to users who will be able to view the styles related to each other under a particular theme.
